attributes.action: Stop supplying weapons and providing military support to the Saudi-led coalition
attributes.additional_details: Yemen is about to go extinct. Thousands of Yemenis have died due to bombings and famine. The UK government is responsible for thousands of deaths as it provided military jets, ammunition supply and technical support.It is the worst humanitarian crisis at this moment in time. The UK must supporting the Saudi-led coalition which has resulted in the killings of innocent lives and provide humanitarian aid to those in need.
attributes.background: We want the UK to suspend the sales of arms to any parties when there is a risk of causing harm or death to Yemeni citizens as well as stop providing diplomatic and military  support to the Saudi-led coalition in Yemen. We want a public statement saying that the UK will not support any more attacks.
